title: Chomsky - Understanding Power (ebook)
description:
This is an addendum to the "Chomsky Books" torrent in which it wasn&#039;t included.  It contains the anthology "Understanding Power - The Indispensable Chomsky", compiled by Peter R. Mitchell and John Schoeffel and published in 2002.  Most of the material is from informal seminar-style discussions with groups of activists or from question and answer periods after public talks.

This anthology is one of the best introductions to Chomsky&#039;s political thinking.  Included are the book in .pdf, .rtf and Microsoft .doc format and the web-based footnotes in .pdf format.  Regrettably, Ch. 1 of the book is missing.
